hero.description: I’m not going to stop the wheel. I’m going to break the wheel.

about.education-heading1: Bachelor of Computer Science and Information Engineering
about.experience-current-description: Supporting frontend development at tilmoch.ai using Angular, focusing on building and maintaining user interfaces and integrating APIs.
about.experience-freelance-description: Built responsive web applications and e-commerce platforms for various clients. Focused on user experience and modern web technologies.

projects.title: Featured Projects
projects.subtitle: Here are some of my recent projects that showcase my skills and expertise.

whoami.title: Who Am I ?
whoami.intro: Hello! My name is Jasur Xaitov — but friends just call me Jasur.
whoami.description1: I'm a 20-year-old frontend developer deeply passionate about the JavaScript ecosystem. Currently, I work as a Frontend Developer at Tilmoch.ai, and I’m also pursuing my studies at INHA University in Tashkent.
whoami.description2: I was born in Surkhandaryo, Denov region, and from a young age, I’ve always been curious about technology.
whoami.description3: At the age of 17, I made a life-changing decision — one that I’ll always be proud of: I chose to become a programmer.
whoami.description4: Since then, I’ve been building, learning, and growing in the world of web development.
whoami.description5: Outside of tech, I enjoy watching UFC fights and playing football — they help me recharge and stay balanced.
whoami.closing: Oh, and one more thing... I'm not a fan of marketing or branding myself — so I’ll keep this short

contact.desc: A dedicated channel created to share all my knowledge and information that may be useful

QURULTOY.name: QURULTOY
QURULTOY.desc: Welcome to the QURULTOY project. We invited experts to our yurt to talk about the history, past, and present of our country. As Abdulla Qodiriy said, 'Returning to the past is a blessed deed.'

main.title: Blog
main.desc: My blog posts are written in Uzbek. There is a lot of information available in English on the internet. My motivation is to generate more content in my native language so it can benefit the Uzbek audience.
